XXklpdraiu:5: agneḥ śabdaś ca sparśaś ca KDA_103a
XXklpdraiu:65: ākāśacitto dhanasāravāsī KDA_327 b ākāśasya guṇaś caikaḥ KDA_102a
XXklpdraiu:84: iti dṛṣṭvā ca te satvā KDA_450a
XXklpdraiu:175: ehīti proktaḥ sa jinena muṇḍo KDA_324a
XXklpdraiu:180: kathaṃ na brāhmaṇā nu te KDA_232d
XXklpdraiu:261: ke te ye brāhmaṇāḥ proktāḥ KDA_251a
XXklpdraiu:267: ko nāmāsti guṇaḥ sa sādhudayito yo nānuyāto dayām* KDA_419b
XXklpdraiu:283: krodham ekaṃ tu yo hanyāt KDA_371c
XXklpdraiu:314: kleśāṃś ca sarvān pravihāya saṃyataḥ KDA_326c
XXklpdraiu:482: tataḥ pitā ca taṃ dṛṣṭā KDA_25a
XXklpdraiu:521: tathā ced dhi bhaved doṣo KDA_243a
XXklpdraiu:556: tad ājñāṃ dehi me tāta KDA_65c
XXklpdraiu:616: tasmāt putra ivātmanīva ca dayāṃ nītvā prakarṣaṃ jane KDA_419c
XXklpdraiu:668: te te syur brāhmaṇāḥ kila KDA_234d
XXklpdraiu:701: te lokā maitracittās tribhuvanasukhadāḥ kṣāntisaurabhyayuktāḥ KDA_486c
XXklpdraiu:720: tvaṃ cāpi hi tathā matvā KDA_297a
XXklpdraiu:728: dayākrāntaṃ cittaṃ na bhavati paradroharabhasaṃ KDA_417a
XXklpdraiu:731: dayālur nodvegaṃ janayati pareṣām upaśamād KDA_418a
XXklpdraiu:732: dayālur viśvāsyo bhavati jagatāṃ bāndhava iva KDA_418b
XXklpdraiu:740: dahate sa parān api (Speyer: svaparān api) KDA_335d
XXklpdraiu:786: dhanyās te bhikṣavo hy ete KDA_21a
XXklpdraiu:821: na kulena na jātyā ca KDA_259a
XXklpdraiu:823: na kopāgniś citte jvalayati hi dayātoyaśiśire KDA_418d
XXklpdraiu:834: na tasya ko 'py abhūt suhṛt* KDA_31b
XXklpdraiu:838: na tv etair hi vinā vipraḥ KDA_210c
XXklpdraiu:843: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti KDA_370c
XXklpdraiu:855: narāṇāṃ tu tathā na hi KDA_146d
XXklpdraiu:863: na saṃrambhakṣobhaḥ prabhavati dayādhīr ahṛdaye KDA_418c
XXklpdraiu:874: nāgāś ca garuḍāś ca te KDA_451b
XXklpdraiu:941: pathi vā yadi vā gṛhe KDA_254b
XXklpdraiu:950: parān dhakṣyati vā na vā KDA_372d
XXklpdraiu:1027: prāpadabhijñāḥ pratisaṃvidaś ca KDA_327 d prāpnuvanti yudhiṣṭhira KDA_271d
XXklpdraiu:1132: bhakṣyate tena kiṃ na hi KDA_216b
XXklpdraiu:1166: bhindann avidyādrim ivāṇḍakośaṃ KDA_327 c bhinnacitto vikīryate KDA_405b
XXklpdraiu:1279: yac ca rājā prajāḥ pāti KDA_430a
XXklpdraiu:1280: yac ca vidvān guruḥ śiṣyān KDA_431a
XXklpdraiu:1281: yac ca vīrā raṇe sthitvā KDA_432a
XXklpdraiu:1356: yātāḥ saukhāvatīṃ te 'py amitarucimuner dharmam ārādhayanti KDA_486d
XXklpdraiu:1405: ye maitrībhāvadharmaṃ kalimatiharaṇaṃ tat subhūteś caritraṃ KDA_486a
XXklpdraiu:1593: śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ na kulaṃ pradhānaṃ KDA_203a
XXklpdraiu:1598: śucau tasmin vāṇī vrajati vikṛtaṃ naiva ca tanuḥ KDA_417b
XXklpdraiu:1624: śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti tribhuvanasukhadaṃ saṃnipātya janaughān* KDA_486b
XXklpdraiu:1704: sanmaitryā viharanta eva muditāṃ prodbhāvayadhvaṃ sadā KDA_419d
XXklpdraiu:1801: saṃkṣepeṇa dayāmataḥ sthiratayā paśyanti dharmaṃ budhāḥ KDA_419a
XXklpdraiu:1828: sākṣāc ca so 'rhann abhavan maharddhikaḥ KDA_326d
XXklpdraiu:1885: suvītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭahemā KDA_327 a suvṛṣṭir iva śasyāni KDA_416c
XXklpdraiu:1902: smṛtau hi tat tathā proktaṃ KDA_120a
XXklpdraiu:1919: svargaṃ gatāḥ śīlam upetya dhīrāḥ KDA_203d
